title: Sound crackle when playing league.
body: As title says, just bought a brand new laptop and my speakers crackle ONLY when playing League of legends, no other game does this. Anyone input?

replies.body: Aside from a possible hardware issue or bad driver, I'm not certain what could be causing that issue.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can take a look.  You should also grab the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to attach some logs in your ticket for more context.  We'll reply back asap!
